name: Founders : Sons of Hyrmalion (Canceled)
blurb: Founders : Sons of Hyrmalion is a MMORPG cubic sandbox themed under victorian colonization of a new world.

rewards.reward: ~\u20ac3.63 Aboriginal : Thank you for your support! To thank you you will receive a special access to our forums along with an exclusive badge.
[Digital] Settler (early bird) : You came here first! To thank you we will offer you a digital copy of the game when it will be released along with a "First Settler" ingame and on the website.
~\u20ac18.20 [Digital] Settler : To grant you the possibility to colonize the world of Founders we give you a digital copy of the game once it is released
~\u20ac21.83 [Digital] Craftsman : To thank you, you will receive a digital game copy along with its soundtrack.
~\u20ac25.47 [Digital] Explorer : To thank you, we will offer you a digital game copy + the soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game.
~\u20ac29.12 [Digital] Adventurer : To thank you, we give offer you a digital game copy + the soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access.

~\u20ac32.76 [Digital] Navigator : To thank you, you will be offered a digital game copy + the soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access.

~\u20ac36.41 [Physical] Technician : To reward you, you will have a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game.

~\u20ac43.69 [Physical] Engineer : To reward you, you will get a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + a Kickstarter exclusive hang glider.

~\u20ac54.62 [Physical] Chief Petty Officer : To reward you, you will be offered a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + an exclusive motorcycle

~\u20ac65.55 [Physical] Midshipman : To reward you, you will have a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + an exclusive ingame automobile.

~\u20ac87.39 [Physical] Ensign : To reward you, we will offer you a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + you choose the name of a street in Valion.

~\u20ac109.27 [Physical] Lieutenant : To reward you, you will get a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + you choose the name of a street in Valion + you design a mission with us.

~\u20ac182.13 [Physical] Commander : To reward you, you will have a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + you choose the name of a street in Valion + you design a mission with us + you get an exclusive Kickstarter massive airplane.

~\u20ac218.54 [Physical] Captain : To reward you, you will be offered a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + you choose the name of a street in Valion + you design a mission with us + you design with us a NPC and its costume.

~\u20ac291.39 [Physical] Vice Admiral : To reward you, you will receive a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + you choose the name of a street in Valion + you design a mission with us + you design with us a NPC and its costume + you get an exclusive Kickstarter massive airplane.

~\u20ac364.23 [Physical] Fleet Admiral: To reward you, we will offer you a physical game copy + the game soundtrack + a digital crafting recipes book + the digital artbook of the game + a beta early access + an alpha early access + a documentary about the making of the game + you choose the name of a street in Valion + you design a mission with us + you design with us a NPC and its costume + you get all four exclusives hang glider, motorcycle, automobile, and airplane.
~\u20ac728.49 [Physical] Collaborator : For this last one, please contact us.
